definition: to do/to make/to produce/to write/to compose/to act as/to engage in/to hold (a party)/to be/to become/to function (in some capacity)/to serve as/to be used for/to form (a bond or relationship)/to pretend/to feign/to act a part/to put on appearance
to (a place)/until (a time)/up to/to go/to arrive/(verb complement denoting completion or result of an action)
to be as good as one's word (idiom)/to keep one's promise

sentences.english: Restaurant light box production must have characteristics, to attract customers.
sentences.chinese: 餐厅灯箱制作肯定要具有特色，要做到吸引顾客。

sentences.english: I think he thought, If Michael can do it, I can do it.
sentences.chinese: 我想他是觉得如果迈克尔能做到，他也能做到。

sentences.english: I think he thought, If Michael can do it, I can do it.
sentences.chinese: 我想他是觉得如果迈克尔能做到，他也能做到。

sentences.english: They did it, I’ve done it, and so can you.
sentences.chinese: 他们做到了，我也曾尝试过，你也可以做到的。

sentences.english: They did it, I’ve done it, and so can you.
sentences.chinese: 他们做到了，我也曾尝试过，你也可以做到的。

sentences.english: A Roget's Thesaurus will do the trick, as will any number of vocabulary building books.
sentences.chinese: 一本罗热辞典或者其它词汇书就可以帮你做到这一点。

sentences.english: The key to following your heart is to learn to deal with fear.
sentences.chinese: 要做到心随所愿，秘诀在于学会克服恐惧。

sentences.english: I know it's hard, Linna, but you can do it.
sentences.chinese: 我知道这很难，琳娜，但是你可以做到。

sentences.english: That's how schoolyard bullies run playgrounds and global godfathers do it everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 这就是校园欺负运行操场和全球教父做到无处不在。

sentences.english: How the hell did he get to be a pezzonovante, Hagen wondered.
sentences.chinese: 黑根在想，他怎么就做到总统顾问上来了。

sentences.english: To do this, we must listen for events.
sentences.chinese: 要做到这一点，我们必须侦听事件。

sentences.english: Everybody's done it in the past.
sentences.chinese: 每个人过去都做到过了。

sentences.english: As difficult as it may be at times, try not to take negative feedback personally.
sentences.chinese: 回复时尽可能不牵动个人情绪，虽然有时候很难做到。

sentences.english: When you delegate work, you’ll need to get used to asking other people to take responsibility for something you’d otherwise do yourself.
sentences.chinese: 当你要授权的时候，你必须做到责权对等。

sentences.english: You wanna die by Post-its? Because I could make that happen.
sentences.chinese: 你想被便利贴弄死吗？因为我可以做到。

sentences.english: Journalists in the United States strive to achieve objectivity.
sentences.chinese: 在美国，新闻工作者力争做到客观。

definition: to achieve/to implement/to realize/to bring about
guarantee/to guarantee/to ensure/to safeguard/to pledge/CL:個|个[ge4]
(idiom) take care of everything; handle everything
to be capable of/to be able to/can
to persevere with/to persist in/to insist on
important/vital/to want/to ask for/will/going to (as future auxiliary)/may/must/(used in a comparison) must be/probably/if
perfect (idiom); perfection/the best of all possible worlds/as good as it gets
